TopicTitle: The Spirit of Kerbin (Tribute to Macey Dean)

Articles.Content:
"The Spirit of Kerbin" A tribute to Macey Dean.

In the depicted scene the Spiritwolf Colonist are now in the custody of Hanland. The morning morning after the battle members of both factions watched as their destroyed fleets reentered the Laythian atmosphere in a burning reminder of their loss, The Spirit of Kerbin burning the brightest.

Nobody knew how she survived reentry, they say it was the spirit of each kerbal onboard that guided her to the ground. She serves as a reminder that all great things come to an end.

A Hanland pilot fails to inflict serious damage with torpedoes , in an act of desperation he rams full speed into the Spirit of Kerbin, ripping open her hull.

The Captain of the Spiritwolf colony confronts Hanlands invasion force.

Edited November 9, 2014 by Voyager55

Beautiful...

...and sad, also sad.
nice! Sad Macey's still gone....

Sadly, by the time I bought KSP Macey Dean was gone (or disappeared shortly after), so I never really got to know him. but he sounds like a terrific guy, and it is truly a shame to see great people vanish. What a moving piece of artwork this is, I can feel the emotions even though I never knew him.

Beautiful...

...and sad, also sad.

spartwo summed it up so well

a great piece of art
Any suggestions on what significant parts of the series I can render into art? If anyone else wants to contribute anything that's great. May Macey's legacy live on.

truly some great piece(s) of art.

Any suggestions on what significant parts of the series I can render into art? If anyone else wants to contribute anything that's great. May Macey's legacy live on.

The episode "Spiritwolf strikes back" where he battles battleship vs carrier with massive amount of parts flying everywhere.

It's generally agreed on that Macey Dean has passed, but that is solely speculation. There aren't too many other logical explanations for disappearing for one and a half years after promising to your rapidly expanding fanbase that season two is on the way, he also hasn't made a single tweet since he disappeared.

Thankyou Zekes for the kindness!

And good sggestion MK3424, i'll think i'll use it.
I guess you know why I clicked on the title of this thread. Amazing work . Me and Suestra would love if you made something out of the first part of the film we're doing.

Really! I'd love to! So I may take inspiration and use scenes from the short opening scene on your channel?
